    Layout: Sidebar Custom

    less than 1 minute read

    This post has a custom sidebar set in the postâ€™s YAML Front Matter.

    An example of how that YAML could look is:

    sidebar:
  - title: "Title"
    image: http://placehold.it/350x250
    image_alt: "image"
    text: "Some text here."
  - title: "Another Title"
    text: "More text here."
